product_name: Gordini Venture Gloves - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Keep your hands toasty warm at the ski resort in the waterproof, insulated and touch-screen compatible women's Gordini Venture Gloves. Synthetic digital grip material lets you use your smartphone or tablet. Polyester exteriors have Aquabloc(R) waterproof, breathable inserts to keep your hands dependably dry on snowy adventures. 200g silk insulation and Hydrowick micro-denier fleece lining combine for warmth that will keep your fingers warm while you carve turns on the ski slopes. Palms and thumbs are reinforced to ensure long-lasting wear. Special buy.
short_description: Keep your hands toasty warm at the ski resort in the waterproof, insulated and touch-screen compatible women's Gordini Venture Gloves.
